dao.name: QRY_RESV_ORDER_STA
dao.statement: select mn.order_sta, mn.wait_seq, mn.title_nam, dt.place_cod, dt.begin_tim, dt.end_tim from bquet_mn mn, bqplace_dt dt where mn.bquet_nos = dt.bquet_nos and dt.use_dat = to_date(:use_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') and mn.order_sta in ('N','W','Q') and mn.bq_ver = '3'
